A low-code way to learn AI - Learn how AI works from a real LLM implemented entirely in Excel

item.title: Announcing Python in Excel
item.description:
Today weâ€™re announcing a significant evolution in the analytical capabilities available within Excel by releasing a Public Preview of Python in Excel. Python in Excel makes it possible to natively combine Python and Excel analytics within the same workbook - with no setup required. With Python in Excel, you can type Python directly into a cell, the Python calculations run in the Microsoft Cloud, and your results are returned to the worksheet, including plots and visualizations.

]]>
